facet_1.name: Sandblast
facet_1.effects: Attacks within the Sand Storm radius now applies a 5-second 20%/30%/40%/50% blind. Successive attacks reapplies the debuff, and refreshes its duration.

facet_2.name: Final Sting
facet_2.effects: Each enemy hero affected by Stinger within the proximity radius instantly emits a 0.5 * Î£ Spell Damage Caustic Finale based on its current level.

effects: Each Epicenter pulse now randomly summons multiple Stinger spines of its corresponding level, at random locations within its radius.
The spine radius is a portion of the current Epicenter radius, and can only affect the same enemy units once per pulse.
Passively releases a lesser Epicenter pulse at a fixed duration.

level_20: +75 Base Epicenter Radius +7 Incremental Epicenter Radius

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Inject a venom per successful attack that causes enemy units to violently explode when they die.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Epicenter. An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

ability_1.name: Burrowstrike
ability_1.details: Burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above Sand King as he resurfaces.
ability_1.description: Burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above Sand King as he resurfaces.

facet_effects.caustic_finale: Applies a Caustic Finale debuff of its corresponding level on all affected enemy units upon resurfacing

interaction_notes: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

ability_2.name: Sand Storm
ability_2.details: Creates a sandstorm that damages enemy units within the radius. The sandstorm immediately dissipates upon leaving the effect radius.
ability_2.description: Creates a sandstorm that damages enemy units within the radius. The sandstorm immediately dissipates upon leaving the effect radius.

facet_effects.invisibility: Grants self invisibility with a fade delay, within the sand storm radius
facet_effects.sandblast: Enhances the storm aura with additional debuffs

interaction_notes: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.

ability_3.name: Stinger
ability_3.details: Strikes and attacks an area with bonus damage and applies a movement speed slow to all enemy units within the radius.
ability_3.description: Strikes and attacks an area with bonus damage and applies a movement speed slow to all enemy units within the radius.

facet_effects.proximity_damage: Deals additional damage to units within the proximity radius

interaction_notes: Crixalis is certainly capable of mercy, but the soul of the sand finds few foes worth sparing.

ability_4.name: Epicenter
ability_4.details: After its cast point, Sand King causes the ground beneath to shudder violently. All enemy units within the radius are damaged and slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the Epicenter radius.
ability_4.description: After its cast point, Sand King causes the ground beneath to shudder violently. All enemy units within the radius are damaged and slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the Epicenter radius.

facet_effects.scepter: Each Epicenter pulse now randomly summons multiple Stinger spines
facet_effects.shard: Passively releases a lesser Epicenter pulse at a fixed duration

technical_details: Radius Increase per Pulse: 13 (20 with talent)
interaction_notes: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.

changes: Reduced Burrowstrike mana cost from 110/120/130/140 to 100/110/120/130.
LVL 10 +8% Stinger movement speed slow increased to +12%.
LVL 15 +150 Burrowstrike cast range increased to +200.
LVL 15 +20 Sand Storm damage per second increased to +25.
Increased Caustic Finale base damage from 15/35/55/75 to 20/40/60/80.
Reduced Caustic Finale enemy max health as damage from 4%/8%/12%/16% to 3%/7%/11%/15%.
Sand Storm now grants invisibility upon cast with a 0.7-second fade time.
Increased Sand Storm radius from 350/400/450/500 to 425/500/575/650.
REMOVED Sandshroud and Dust Devil facets.
ADDED Sandblast facet.
Rescaled Stinger effect radius from 225/255/285/315 to 230/250/270/290.
Rescaled Stinger spell damage bonus from 35/70/105/140 to 50/75/100/125.
ADDED Final Sting facet.
LVL 20 +100/+12 Epicenter base radius/incremental radius reduced to +75/+7.
LVL 25 +35% Sand Storm blind miss chance/movement speed slow changed to +40% Sand Storm movement speed slow.
Increased base strength from 21 to 22.
Increased agility gain from 1.8 to 2.
Increased intelligence gain from 1.8 to 2.
Increased base attack damage from 7â15 to 19â29.
LVL 10 +0.3s Burrowstrike stun duration changed to +100 Caustic Finale radius.
